definition: to set sth upright or straight/to promote an employee from part-time to full-time (or from deputy to principal)/(old) to raise from concubine to wife status

first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Re-righting the walkie-talkie, you can cancel the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 把對講機重新扶正，即可取消報警。

sentences.english: Through the above, Chinese medicines has proven effective role in NASH rats.
sentences.chinese: 證明攻毒扶正法治療NASH大鼠有切實的作用。

sentences.english: The young people have a kind strength which can strengthen body resistance and eliminating evil in future.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人身上有一種在未來能夠扶正祛邪的力量。

sentences.english: These indicate that this herb has the effects of increasing organism immunity and supporting healthy energy.
sentences.chinese: 說明該藥具有提高機體免疫力，扶正固本的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the quality standards for the Zhenqi Fuzheng Oral Liquid.
sentences.chinese: 目的制訂貞芪扶正口服液質量標準。

sentences.english: Casing centralizer with double bow spring blade is modified from single bow.
sentences.chinese: 使用最普遍的是單弓形彈簧片套管扶正器。

sentences.english: Enriching consumptive disease, benefiting pneuma, protect lung and tonifying kidney, support healthy energy.
sentences.chinese: 補虛損，益精氣，保肺益腎，扶正固本。

sentences.english: I smiled, small SanNeng centralizer, the devil angel's wings.
sentences.chinese: 我笑了，小三能扶正，魔鬼都能長出天使的翅膀。

sentences.english: Many nations have issued the norms of computing centralizer intervals.
sentences.chinese: 很多國家都頒佈了套管扶正器間距計算規範。

sentences.english: That shelf isn't square on the wall; can you straighten it?
sentences.chinese: 牆上的那個擱架不平你能把它扶正嗎？

sentences.english: The design of centralizer assembly is the basic and key job for directional drilling.
sentences.chinese: 扶正器組合設計是鑽定向井基本而關鍵的工作。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Zhongyao Fuzheng Mixture(ZFM)on cytokines in tumor model mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究中藥扶正合劑對腫瘤模型細胞因子的影響。

sentences.english: Dismantle square group in order to strengthen body resistance and eliminating evil each and concurrently bitter cold that construct add sweet warm curative effect best group.
sentences.chinese: 各拆方組中以扶正祛邪兼施的苦寒加甘溫組療效最佳。

sentences.english: Hold it straight while I put in the nail.
Now that the Hunley is upright once again, perhaps the mystery will be solved.
sentences.chinese: 現在亨利號船體被扶正，謎團可能將被揭開。
